tonemason Kith was a craftsman of Clan Flameshade that took up residence in Grymforge for a time during the late 15 century DR.
Kith was a compassionate dwarf—at least compared to other duergar from his clan—that was wholly dedicated to his craft as a stone mason.
In the , the duergar of Clan Flameshade began an excavation of Grymforge with the aim of staking claim on an adamantine forge. While his fellow clansman followed the orders Nere and the cult of the Absolute, Kith spent his time studying the ruined architecture of the underground fortress, hoping to learn more about its history and downfall.
